description:
8.93 headphone
Apply head-related transfer functions (HRTFs) to create virtual
loudspeakers around the user for binaural listening via headphones.
The HRIRs are provided via additional streams, for each channel
one stereo input stream is needed.

The filter accepts the following options:

gain.description: Set gain applied to audio. Value is in dB. Default is 0.

hrir.description: Set format of hrir stream. Default value is 'stereo'. Alternative value is 'multich'. If value is set to 'stereo', number of additional streams should be greater or equal to number of input channels in first input stream. Also each additional stream should have stereo number of channels. If value is set to 'multich', number of additional streams should be exactly one. Also number of input channels of additional stream should be equal or greater than twice number of channels of first input stream.

lfe.description: Set custom gain for LFE channels. Value is in dB. Default is 0.

map.description: Set mapping of input streams for convolution. The argument is a '|' separated list of channel names in order as they are given as additional stream inputs for filter. This also specify number of input streams. Number of input streams must be not less than number of channels in first stream plus one.

size.description: Set size of frame in number of samples which will be processed at once. Default value is 1024. Allowed range is from 1024 to 96000.

type.description: Set processing type. Can be 'time' or 'freq'. 'time' is processing audio in time domain which is slow. 'freq' is processing audio in frequency domain which is fast. Default is 'freq'.

name: headphone

parameters.description: Set mapping of input streams for convolution. The argument is a ’|’-separated list of channel names in order as they are given as additional stream inputs for filter. This also specify number of input streams. Number of input streams must be not less than number of channels in first stream plus one.
parameters.name: map

parameters.description: Set gain applied to audio. Value is in dB. Default is 0.
parameters.name: gain

parameters.description: Set processing type. Can be time or freq. time is processing audio in time domain which is slow. freq is processing audio in frequency domain which is fast. Default is freq.
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Set custom gain for LFE channels. Value is in dB. Default is 0.
parameters.name: lfe

parameters.description: Set size of frame in number of samples which will be processed at once. Default value is 1024. Allowed range is from 1024 to 96000.
parameters.name: size

parameters.description: Set format of hrir stream. Default value is stereo. Alternative value is multich. If value is set to stereo, number of additional streams should be greater or equal to number of input channels in first input stream. Also each additional stream should have stereo number of channels. If value is set to multich, number of additional streams should be exactly one. Also number of input channels of additional stream should be equal or greater than twice number of channels of first input stream.
parameters.name: hrir
